column2: You can show the Command Palette in Visual Studio Code by pressing `kb(workbench.action.showCommands)`, `kbstyle(F1)`.
To insert a cursor below the current line in Visual Studio Code, you can use the command `kb(editor.action.insertCursorbelow)`.
To format the entire document in Visual Studio Code, you can use the command `kb(editor.action.formatDocument)`.
You can use the command `kb(workbench.action.gotoSymbol)` to go to a symbol in Visual Studio Code.
To close the current editor in Visual Studio Code, you can use the command `kb(workbench.action.closeActiveEditor)`, `kbstyle(Ctrl+W)`.
The command for creating a new file is `kb(workbench.action.files.newUntitledfile)`.
The command for opening a file is `kb(workbench.action.files.openfile)`.
The command for toggling full screen is `kb(workbench.action.toggleFullScreen)`.
The command for starting to debug is `kb(workbench.action.debug.start)`.
The command for creating a new terminal is `kb(workbench.action.terminal.new)`.
